billEvents.eventText: REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION

title: Expands the amount of information available about registered sex offenders on the division of criminal justice services website
summary: Expands the amount of information available to police and the public, by means of the internet, on registered sex offenders; authorizes any person to register with the division of criminal justice services to receive e-mail notification of all sex offenders residing within their zip code.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the correction law, in relation to the registration of sex offenders
